title: E major harmonic dictation - cadential six-four

content.question: Before listening to the first playing, please look at the staff below. Notice that there are nine chords in the progression; the soprano and bass notes and the Roman numeral of the first chord are given.Now listen to the progression for the first time and begin working.

unit.text: 3: Music Fundamentals III - Triads and Seventh Chords

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Notate the soprano and bass pitches of a performed harmonic progression in a major or minor key (may include chromatically altered pitches).
